content.d: Everyone, look at this!
Oh! Both μ's and Aqours are preparing for their events!
We can’t afford to lose to them!
Even so, we haven’t decided what we’re doing yet, right?
As usual...
We all want to do different things~
Hehe. But that’s just how we are.
Yes, indeed. But there is one thing we all have in common, right?
Something we have in common...?
I got it! We all want to have a great time with everyone who supports us!
That’s correct!
Then we’re all on the same page~!
In that case, wouldn’t it be great to have a super cute photo session, which Kasumin already planned for?
A sports meet with Lanzhu would be fun too!
I think a beautiful pose contest taught by me, a senior member, would also be good.
I think it would be great to have a movie screening according to my recommendations!
I wonder how many times we’ve had this conversation...
Ahaha......
Hmm, let’s just do all of them. Instead of discussing what to narrow it down to, we could all just be preparing for the things we wanna do, right?
That might be a good idea...
Everyone~ Any objections?
Nope!
